name: Hidden Object Mysterious Detective in the Kingdom London Free
name_original: Hidden Object Mysterious Detective in the Kingdom London Free
description:
London has always hidden a lot of different secrets and mysterious events. But very few people even know about it. All thanks to one mysterious detective who goes fearlessly to solve the most mysterious crimes. One day a stranger addressed to him. A great misfortune has happened to the stranger and the mysterious detective was his only hope, because everybody else has refused to help him. And so, you as his last hope have to help him! Do not waste your time, because every minute is precious!

FEATURES:
1. 50 Amazing levels that will challenge your vision and perception every step of the way.
2. Stunning graphics
3. Hundreds of hidden objects with various difficulties.
4. Exciting mini games that will test your mettle and brain.
5. Hints to get you out of tight spots when you fail to find objects on time.
6. Mysterious story line while you search objects to make the game more exciting.
